bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with fei han 肺寒 . Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry gan 柑 quotes Kai bao xin xiang ding ben cao 開 寶 新 詳 定 本 草 Kai bao chong ding ben cao 開寶重定本草 : 多食令人 脾冷發痼癖 , “Consumed in large quantities it causes spleen cold resulting in obstinacy-illness with aggregation-illness”. To this LSZ added a statement: 令人肺 冷生痰 , “It causes lung cold and generates phlegm”.
